title: Sam's cheesecake brownies
ingredients: ['110g dark chocolate (70% cocoa solids)', '110g unsalted butter', '150g caster sugar', '60g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '2 medium eggs', 'For the cheesecake mixture', '225g cream cheese', '50g caster sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '1 medium egg']
